Choose from 6 available dinosaurs and do battle to win the amazoness queen, and the title of Dino Rex: the king of the land!
Acquiring various types of egg-shaped items and weapons can give you an advantage in a battle.

name: IronStrike
description: IronStrike is a 4-player co-op roguelike featuring physics-based swordplay, intricate gestural spellcasting, and dexterous archery. Wield a sword, bow & arrow, or magic as you fight to rescue the gods of a vibrant fantasy world.

name: Icarus: Art Deco Furniture Pack
description: Decorate your base with our Art Deco furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an art deco aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some style to your home.

name: Icarus: Industrial Furniture Pack
description: Decorate your base with our Industrial furniture pack. Featuring a range of new furniture and decorations to bring an industrial aesthetic to the base of your dreams. Support our continued development and add some functional styling to your home.

name: MechanixMind: IQ Puzzle Adventure
description: Dive into a world where physics reigns and every level offers endless possibilities.

name: Minigolf Galaxy
description: Minigolf Galaxy invites you to create your very own cosmic minigolf courses, engage in fun challenges, and embark on a stellar journey through the universe.

name: Custom Order Maild 3D2: It's a Night Magic Love Hotel Karaoke All in Pack
description: Included in this DLC: 【New Yotogi Events】 Love Hotel Tour *Compatible with Muku, Majime, and Rindere heroine types. 【Costume】 Winter Sweater & Dress Set 【Hairstyles】 Empress Hair Set Cool Beauty Hair Set + Accessories Set 【Background】 Love Hotel 2 【Dance】 Reformative Heartography Karaoke Dance

name: Quickie: Fantasy Adventure
description: Gather your companions and set off on an epic quest to save your beloved home. Encounter mysterious forces, seduce strange and sexy creatures... and shape the fate of the world in this exciting and sexy visual novel!

name: An Arcade Full of Cats: TimeWarp Trouble
description: Leo and Fofiño may have bitten off more than they can chew this time! Embark on an exciting journey through three brand-new scenarios in the latest expansion for "An Arcade Full of Cats".

name: Deepcut
description: Become king and rule over the eyes and ears of your kingdom.

name: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods
description: Abandoned Cabins in the Woods is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a paranormal investigator and streamer called Thomas who decided to investigate the haunted Idaho woods for the paranormal evidence upon the request of his fans.

name: Wormswarm
description: Wormswarm is an experimental platformer about jumping on abstract wriggling worms while scoring points.

name: Power Punch
description: A multiplayer online game where you can enjoy boxing and happy sports in the battle royale arena. On the way to become the boxing king! We'll not afraid of opponent! but afraid of break the TV at home!

name: Uki-Uki-Tengoku 2
description: Retro 2D side-scrolling shooter with pixel art. Control a penguin (Laser), a fish (Firebreath), and a human (Railgun) to achieve a high score!

name: Art of Rally: Australia
description: Jump back behind the wheel with the Art of Rally: Australia DLC, and buckle up for a memorable off-road adventure as we take you on a tour down under. 6 rally stages & 1 freeroam location. 4 new cars, 2 new tunes.

name: Cats on Streets
description: Cats on Streets invites players to spot and uncover hidden feline friends in cities like Tokyo, Paris, and London. Unleash your inner detective and embark on this charming cat-hunting adventure!

name: Color Bomb!
description: Color Bomb!: Just a simple color-matching game.

name: Zombie City Rescue
description: Imagine being trapped in a city full of zombies, with life and death in front of you! Don't worry, you will become one of the survivors! Quick reaction and precise shooting are your survival rules, but don't forget to stay calm, because every step can be your last! Are you ready?

name: Rivers of Blood
description: Alice suffers an accident and wakes up in a parallel world created by her unconscious in a state of coma. Now she needs to find the strength and means to survive and return to the real world, in this new reality that is completely different and much more terrifying than any nightmare.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Majin Tensei - Blind Thinker
description: Set in the year 20XX in "Neo Tokyo," a symbol of the new era What is the "demon summoning program" left behind by the father who disappeared?

name: Meadow: Lemming Family Skins Pack
description: Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two new Lemming inspired cosmetic skins, one for the adult Badger and one for the Badger Cub.

name: Plant Therapy: Cat Art Pack
description: This Plant Therapy Cat Art Pack is full of over 30 new cat related items to take your game to level cat-tastic!

name: Trading Simulator
description: Build your financial empire in Trading Simulator by strategically investing in businesses, navigating a dynamic market, and using realistic trading mechanics. Are you ready to turn your financial dreams into reality?

name: Volden Idle
description: Grind your way to 99 in this MMO inspired idle/clicking game!

name: Finding America: New England
description: Explore scenic landscapes, uncover hidden treasures, and immerse yourself in the rich history of this iconic region.

name: Black Beacon Hill
description: Follow the story of the [Phantoms] as forces beyond their control drag them back into a vendetta in the streets, the Ulstanian-Kostakovian war they left behind rages on in the distance, and an existential threat looms over all. A visual novel with a unique design minimalistic top-down shooter game.

name: Corgi in the Box
description: You are locked in an unfamiliar room with your beloved dog. Use the items in the room and cooperate with your dog to escape. There is a short story and three different endings. When you reach an ending, a hidden secret will be revealed.

name: Grog
description: Grog is a First-Person, up-to-4-player online multiplayer party game where you compete against your friends in various Australian-inspired minigames to see who the greatest Aussie dad is.

name: Stellaris: Astral Planes
description: Includes a new core system and technologies. New planes to explore. New branching narratives.

name: Lizard Survivors: Battle for Hyperborea
description: They have launched an active invasion on our lands in late September this year, so let us break free of the slavic hand that held us by our balls for many ages! Rally all of our reptile militia, we will end this all together!

name: Anathema Tower Defense
description: Anathema Tower Defense is a Hero Tower Defense game where you command a powerful Hero and build and upgrade towers to fight back against increasingly powerful waves of enemies.

name: Forza Motorsport: Premium Add-Ons Bundle
description: Xbox Game Pass members, upgrade your racing experience in Forza Motorsport and Forza Horizon 5 with this unmissable offer. The Premium Add-Ons Bundle* includes Car Packs, VIP Memberships, in-game credits, and more content for both games.

name: Loot Box Quest: Mystic Maidens
description:
The mystic anime maidens are waiting for you.
Don't let them wait for too long.

name: Until The Last Bullet
description: Until The Last Bullet is a unique combination of an FMV and rail-shooter game in which you navigate the winding halls of an abandoned factory, eliminating waves of bloodthirsty mutants.

name: Dredge: The Pale Reach
description:
The Pale Reach is the first official expansion for Dredge - a cosmic horror fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. This content adds a brand new, ice-themed biome that can be experienced at any stage in your playthrough.

In The Pale Reach, you’ll navigate the treacherous ice fields to discover a mystery frozen under the ice. Retrace the steps of the last crew that came before you and unearth a story of bitter betrayal. Find some familiar faces and develop new equipment to navigate the area and profit from its inhabitants.

name: Tears of Adria
description: Tears of Adria is an immersive fantasy RPG where exploration meets unpredictability. Shape your party's destiny with randomized level-ups, face swift auto-battles, and delve into a world rich with secrets and magical items. Play either solo or with friends.

name: Aladdin of the Forsaken Lands
description: Experience a fantastical take on the classic Arabian Nights tale! Using the classic ATB (Active Time Battle) combat system, six adventurers will travel across sand dunes and past colossal sandworms to uncover a treasure which may save their kingdom.

name: Tactics Below
description: Tactics Below is a turn-based strategy roguelike where you assemble a party of 4 characters and conquer challenging waves of diverse enemies. Unlock new skills, upgrade your characters and create distinct synergies each time you play.

name: My Douchey Boss Has a Gentle Twin Brother?!
description: Kyle's new boss, Vincent, is mischievous and eccentric. One day, Kyle bumps into his boss after work and is surprised when his superior acts kind. Later, he finds out he'd actually met his boss' twin brother, Vernon. The brothers are estranged, but what happens when they fall for the same person?

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Omni-Man
description: Omni-Man soars into the Mortal Kombat Universe joining the roster as a new Kombatant. This pack includes playable character Omni-Man, including all new move-sets inspired by the Invincible animated series.

name: Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance
description: As Himiko Masaki continues the search for her mother, the resistance to change ever marches on when new rebellion groups challenge the city's obsession with Shinogi Chess, and the struggle for truth envelops Yoshino High School. Every move counts in Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance!

name: Test Lab Inc.
description: Customize your skills and rain hell upon the endless hordes of robots. Test Lab Inc. is a fast-paced game where you'll be constantly tweaking your abilities until you become the ultimate weapon of mass destruction and crush all the puny robots that dare cross your path.

name: Sociable Soccer 24
description: Sociable Soccer 24 is the exhilarating, cross-platform, arcade football franchise. Designed by Sensible Soccer creator Jon Hare, this former title on Apple Arcade has fast-paced, arcade-style intuitive gameplay, with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: Space Battle Royale
description: Calling all space pilots! Fight your way to the final showdown inside the mysterious Cube, unleashing havoc and leaving only the debris of the rival ships behind. Oh, did you find yourself left among the wreckage? Upgrade your attributes, modify your ship – and get back into the carnage!

name: Strategic Command: World War I - Empires in Turmoil
description: Our Empires in Turmoil DLC adds six exciting new campaigns to Strategic Command World War I.

name: Adventure Tanks
description: Engage in fierce battles against rival tanks in a variety of arenas. Strategize your moves, dodge enemy fire, and reach the ultimate goal!

name: Spacecat Simulator
description: Adopt, feed and customize your own virtual pet in Spacecat Simulator! Take care of your space cat, keep it happy and healthy. Play exciting mini-games to earn points, unlock skins and accessories in the shop. Create a unique look for your virtual pet and have even more fun in Spacecat Simulator! Become the best space cat sitter with our pet care simulation game.

name: An Arcade Full of Cats
description: Journey through gaming history's time and space, while searching for adorable feline companions in 'An Arcade Full of Cats,' the ultimate pet'em up hidden object game.

name: The King of Fighters XIII: Global Match
description: An updated rerelease of The King of Fighters XIII, featuring rollback netcode and expanded online lobby features.

name: Storm Striker
description: Stormstriker is a hyperactive 5v5 PvP third-person shooter with colorful hero characters, action-packed gameplay, and an emphasis on teamplay! Join the battlefield by choosing a hero that’s right for your playstyle!

name: Smoots Pinball
description: Enjoy an exciting and fun multiplayer pinball experience with Smoots Pinball! Play on 5 tables based on our popular Smoots games, complete missions, and unlock extras. Can you score 1,000,000 points? Play solo or with friends and show off your pinball skills!

name: Outerstellar
description: Stranded on a hostile and deadly planet, you must gather resources, build shelter, and fight to survive each night. But the secrets of this world await in a gripping sci-fi survival PvP game.

name: Snow Fortress 2
description: Dive into a VR winter wonderland! Build your own icy fortresses, engage in epic snowball battles, and defend your village from an army menacing snowmen. Stay Frosty!

name: BTD: BTD
description: BTD:BTD is a TPS/FPS game similar to a tactical shooter or survival horror where you fight for survival in a post-apocalyptic world. In a new era without order, brute force is the law and the right to live must be obtained by defeating the enemy in front of you.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue
description: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue is an official spin-off of Love Live! Sunshine. Yohane's fantasy world sets the stage for a 2D metroidvania in "Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the Deepblue"!

name: Lucky Hero
description: "Lucky Hero" is a Roguelike symbol-building game. Your weapons and equipment have transformed into symbols, and by spinning the Wheel of Fortune, you will face various powerful enemies. This game offers a vast array of symbols and character skills for players to explore and combine.

name: 7th Domain
description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.

name: Assassin's Creed Nexus VR
description:
Play a pivotal role in history in this new story built only for VR. Thrust your blade in visceral combat as you climb and parkour anywhere throughout the open maps. Stealthily blend into a crowd, interact with civilians, and feel the rush of air assassinations.

Abstergo Industries has found a way to retrieve powerful lost artifacts that can be used to manipulate people's beliefs. To sabotage their plan, you’ll uncover all-new stories and accomplish new missions as legendary Assassins.

name: Oxygen Cocktail
description: Embark on a captivating adventure in Oxygen Cocktail, an open-world visual novel game. Solve puzzles, make friends, and uncover secrets in a charming rural village. Immerse yourself in a unique aesthetic that blends isometric pixel art and other styles.

name: The Kindeman Remedy
description: The most blasphemous, diabolical and morally unacceptable management game ever. Aided by a lascivious nun in a hellish prison, rig executions, conduct horrid experiments and do unspeakable things to create The Kindeman Remedy. Don't fear: this time, you're the monster!

name: Aquamariner
description: Aquamariner is a casual fishing simulation game which give you, the player the opportunity to embark on a relaxing voyage to use the only tool you have, your fishing rod, the help raise funds to rebuild your damaged home.

name: Bopl Battle
description: A couch/online game where you battle your friends with unique and wild abilities. There are many choices such as a shrink ray, creating black holes, stopping time and attaching a rocket engine to the stage to send it flying. Choose a combination that synergizes well to win the round!

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections
description: The next exciting entry in the STORM series, celebrating the 20th anniversary of Naruto's anime debut, releases 2023! The game features new playable characters in addition to the 124 ninjas from past series! Plus, it connects key moments from the first four STORM entries into one game for the first time.

name: Kodama Battles
description: Kodama Battles is a singleplayer AutoChess Roguelite with a jolly bunch of Kodamas to collect, gather and upgrade. Build an unique team with unexpected synergies, try new playstyles each run and become king of the moonlight forest.

name: Hira Hira Hihiru
description: "Hira Hira Hihiru" is a visual novel set in a fictional Taishō Era. It tells the story of its two protagonists' struggle against Aerodema, a terrifying disease which brings the dead back to life.

name: Scarecrows of Illyria
description: Sole survivor of a terrible incident, you find yourself in the company of new friends and new conflict on the island of Illyria.

name: Arma Reforger
description: Powered by the new Enfusion engine, Arma Reforger lets you fight for supremacy over 51 km2 of incredible island terrain in an authentic Cold War setting, or create unique scenarios in real-time with the Game Master curation mode. Return to Everon, the war-driven microstate from the hit game that started it all, Arma: Cold War Assault.

name: Offroad: Dead Planet
description: Offroad: Dead Planet is an offroading physics game. Play as a new arrival on Earth, unwilling to abandon the planet to ruin. Experience complex vehicle physics, terrain modification, deforming tires, a reactive driver, trash to pick up and robots murdering you all while carving your own path.

name: Anvil Saga
description: Anvil Saga is a management sim with RPG elements where you take control of a blacksmith shop amidst the Hundred Years' War. Each decision you make impacts the story and gameplay.

name: Loddlenaut
description:
Loddlenaut is an ocean cleanup adventure set on a vibrant alien planet. Play as an interstellar custodian sent to clean up a polluted ocean planet. Repurpose marine debris and take care of axolotl-like alien creatures!

As you clean up the planet, you’ll run into axolotl-like aliens known as “loddles.” Protect them from the polluted waters and feed them aquatic fruits while you make their planet habitable again. Depending on their diet, loddles will grow in different ways and develop unique traits and abilities that will further enable them to survive on this polluted planet.

name: Universe For Sale
description: Universe for Sale is a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.

name: Edge of Dead: Under a Uranium Sky
description: Edge Of Dead is an action roguelike game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Use shotguns, power saws, axes, hand grenades, cybernetic implants, and more to battle your way across the scorched landscape.

name: Eyra: The Crow Maiden
description:
Eyra the Crow Maiden is a new and original 8-bit video game for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). Inspired by the sword and sorcery genre, the world of Eyra takes inspiration from stories of characters like Conan the Barbarian, Red Sonja and Tarzan.

The game's gameplay and mechanics are based on titles such as Rastan Saga, Cadash, Castlevania, Blades of Vengeance and Jill of the Jungle.

A 16-bit version port of the game to Super Nintendo and Sega Genesis has also been announced as part of a stretch goal for the NES games Kickstarter campaign.

name: Small Saga
description: Small Saga is a turn-based RPG that takes place in a medieval rodent society beneath the streets of modern London. The story follows Verm, a particularly angry mouse armed with a pen knife, who is hunting for the human who stole his tail. On the way, Verm befriends a mole wizard, a squirrel harlequin, and a lab rat lancer. Together, the party upend rodent society, clash with titans, and eventually face off against the gods themselves.

name: Sol Frontiers
description:
Engage in space battles, upgrade starfighters, and explore the vast galaxy!

Every sun has its shadow. In SOL FRONTIERS, every space battle in the galaxy is a step towards unraveling the mystery. Engage in turn-based strategy to illuminate the darkness in this space battle saga.

name: Fortress
description:
Me and my friends used to play a game called 'fortress'.

Fortress is a game made for GameMakerItalia Terroroctober jam. The jam theme was "Cut"!

name: Ben Tennyson: Ace Attorney
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen in a world where Phoenix Wright never lost his badge? And yet, he still lost Zak Gramarye's case? A major difference would be that he never would've gotten involved with Kristoph Gavin, which in turn means he would never meet Apollo Justice.

But... Then what?
This series will explore that very possibility

name: Dreamcore95idle.exe
description: dreamcore inspired incremental game with vaporwave aesthetics

name: Incident In Oakwood
description: An urban explorer ventures out to an abandoned cabin in the woods that was involved in an unsolved alien abduction case from the 1960s. UFO activity and sightings of extraterrestrial beings have been reported in the area of Oakwood forest dating back all the way to the 1950s.

name: Tsuki Adventure 2
description: The sequel to the smash hit pocket bunny’s adventure has arrived! Embark on a new journey out from the Japanese forests and countryside vistas of Mushroom Village and into the unknown! In this new episode of the beloved rabbit’s tale, follow Tsuki along the winding path as he explores the enchanting groves of the kawaii world. Immerse yourself in the charming aesthetic of a kinder world, where furry friends, thrilling mysteries, and fulfilling choices await.

name: Pure Nastalgia
description: This one of a kind gem provides you with the opportunity to sample most if not all of your favorite Super Mario Bros. games. Many of the greatest and most brilliant level designs ever invented from previous SMB titles have been selected, reimagined, and added to this unforgettable compendium to provide a brand new, fun and nostalgic experience for the family. This 38 level anthology is far more than simply a compilation as it also features custom level designs as well as hidden warp zones and coin rooms.

name: Sky Fortress: Odyssey
description: Embark on a steampunk-style grand adventure where technology and fantasy merge, unveiling the secrets of the world of Setsemir!

name: Spacefarer Solitaire
description: Spacefarer Solitaire is a beautifully designed and animated classic game for Nintendo Switch, with excellent replay value.

name: Spacefarer Mahjong
description: Spacefarer Mahjong is a classic Mahjong game with multiple play modes and styles.

name: Tobari Dream Ocean + Nightmare
description:
For those of you who want to experience the best of both worlds, the sea of fun and the sea of nightmares, this is the place. A 2D action game with various magic 'Tobari Dream Ocean' and Nightmarish additional content 'Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare' bundle!

Tobari Dream Ocean is a side-scrolling action game in which players clear stages while acquiring various kinds of magic from enemies.

Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare, dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari Dream Ocean' – now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

Nightmare is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer. For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

name: Doomed: By the Hour 2
description: Doomed: By The Hour 2 is a megawad with 32 speedmaps created between 1-3 hours by finnks13 & Yumheart, with a special guest map by gabirupee. Maps are generally pretty short & violent, with a nice slaughtery finale in the last two episodes being generally equivalent to Speed of Doom.

name: Teardown: Ultimate Edition
description:
Prepare the perfect heist in this simulated and fully destructible voxel world. Tear down walls with vehicles or explosives to create shortcuts. Stack objects to reach new heights. Use the environment to your advantage in the most creative way you can think of.

Teardown: Ultimate Edition includes
Teardown
Teardown: Season Pass
Quilez R0113R Robot - A spawnable, transformable robot vehicle equipped with destructive weapon systems and a grappling hook.

name: Super Classics HD Bundle
description: Contains the games: Green Soldiers Heroes + Super Snaker Block DX

name: Madden NFL 24: Michael Vick 20th Anniversary Edition
description: Get the Michael Vick Edition* to stack your Ultimate Team with Vick's favorite players.

name: Lake: Special Delivery
description: Take a trip back to the 1980's and visit the beautiful lakeside town of Providence Oaks, deliver their mail, and meet its charming residence. This bundle includes the base game, Lake, and its festive holiday-themed prequel, Lake: Season's Greetings.

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Autumn Part 2
description: Experience the ultimate autumn adventure with our new Battle Pass, featuring a progression up to 55 levels with exciting rewards!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Autumn Bundle Part 2
description: Experience the ultimate autumn adventure with our new Battle Pass, featuring a progression up to 55 levels with exciting rewards!

name: Crescent Quest: Y2K Home Expansion
description: A room with a Y2K aesthetic for your Crescent Quest home and a few wallpapers for your device!

name: Stray Blade: Valley of Strays
description: Sixth months have passed after Farren and Boji's last adventure in Stray Blade. Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.

name: Teardown: Time Campers
description: Saddle up and prepare for a wild ride back to a time when explosives were made from dynamite and sledgehammers were... still sledgehammers. Let your destructive imagination run rampant as you execute daring escapades across a fully destructible wild west.

name: Lightracer Spark: Stars Will
description: The second free DLC of Lightracer: Spark. You will travel to the frontline of cosmic warfare, witnessing the decline and rebirth of a stellar civilization, and making crucial decisions that determine the fate of all beings in the universe.

name: Please (Don't) Touch the Art
description:
Take on the role of an uncultured and unprepared art museum curator in Please (Don’t) Touch the Art, a management sim-slash-visual novel where the only thing less ready for a make-it or break-it museum exhibition than you is the artwork itself.

Get your quarrelsome gallery of talking paintings and moving statues to stop fighting before the grand gala, or watch the museum crash and burn around you – the choice is yours!

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Law of Salvage
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Tool: Captain Laffite (Legendary Hunter), Scuttled Glory (Legendary Winfield 1887 Terminus), Knuckle Shunt (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Brawler), Hagfish Bronze (Legendary Choke Bomb)

name: Danjigoku
description: Danjigoku is a retro-styled classic arcade twin-stick shoot 'em up game. Shoot through hordes of aliens and collect 7 different kinds of upgrades to survive as long as possible!

name: The Forgotten Tribe
description: The Forgotten Tribe is a small arcade game with 9 levels to go through and get your fellow tribesmen back. Use a map to navigate the dungeon and successfully collect all of your tribe to unlock a happy ending!

name: Ziggy Zaggy
description: Switch the sides to go further in the world.

name: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Mythology Pack
description: A mythical skull has descended upon Harmonia! This is the first DLC of Skul: The Hero Slayer, a story about a special little skeleton, Skul, who fights humans to save the captured demon king.

name: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion
description: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion is a wuxia open-world RPG as well as a pixelated Jianghu survival simulator where you start as a nobody and struggle your way to rise in the world of martial arts.

name: College Sex: Episode 4
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go on a double date at a nightclub that is about to be opened.

name: Car Parking Real Driving Sim
description: Build the vehicle of your dreams in this parking game full of realistic details and challenging missions! Complete missions now, earn rewards and get your dream vehicle.

name: Ninja Forest Maze
description: Help me test the ninja of the cat tribe. Move the blocks on the screen to create a path. You can move the block by scrolling the mouse. If an emergency quest occurs in the middle, you must use it to create a path. If you click on an empty space without a photo, the quest window will disappear.

name: Loca Deserta: Odesa
description: Take on the role of a simple Cossack who helps to build the economy of a new region. Find all treasures and place them on the Hill of Glory!

name: Run and Hide
description: The player needs to hide in objects from the hunter. Each item has a lifetime, when the item dies the player is thrown out of it.

name: Visual novel for the kids: Lumi And Baby - Hamster And Baby Dragon
description: Read an interactive bedtime story with your children, a tale of a positive hamster called Lumi and his friend a baby dragon. Lumi and Baby lost their homes and all the animals in the forest help them. Made for children aged 5-8.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - The Crepuscule Zone
description:
Version 1.5 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Huohuo, Argenti and Hanya
• New area: Fyxestroll Garden
• New trailblaze mission
• New companion mission for Argenti
• Simulated Universe update (World 8) and new enemies
• New main event: A Foxian Tale of the Haunted
• …and more!

name: FreeChicken
description: A 3D adventure single-player game for freedom! Test your agility to avoid traps and obstacles as you embark on a journey for freedom! Don't worry, there's a game save function, so start playing right away! Our game supports both English and Korean.

name: Cooktopia
description: Cook and serve your delicious orders as fast as you can. A must try cooking simulator with endless fun!

name: My Next Life as a Bird
description: "My Next Life as a Bird" is a speedrun platformer game. Players can customize various mechanics using "Bird Coins," evade incoming magical projectiles, and aim to reach the finish line as quickly as possible, creating their own fastest completion journey.

name: Teku
description: Place hexagonal tiles to form islands across a selection of varied levels. Teku is a peaceful game where the goal is to achieve the highest possible score.

name: Mystery at Grand Fir Village
description: Enter a colorful town where new stories evolve every day. What clues will you find in this mystery life-sim? Will you make new friends? Be the local trouble-maker? Spend a rainy day at your treehouse?

name: Red Head: To The Rescue
description: Rescue the gem stolen by the evil sorcerer Vamooth and restore peace to the kingdom. Prepare yourself to face a wide variety of enemies, such as slimes, evil trees, and giant bosses that occupy almost the entire screen.

name: Muv-Luv: Teito Moyu - The Imperial Capital Burns
description: A Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse prelude story released alongside the PC version of the Total Eclipse visual novel. It focuses on Takamura Yui's past during her days as a cadet for the Imperial Guard training school. Covering issues such as her interaction with her friends and allies, to her first battle against the BETA and the reason to her attachment to the Type-94C.

name: Dracoslayer
description: Dracoslayer is a fighting game title with a heavy emphasis on elemental abilities and PvE action.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Best of Macro Photography
description: Dive into a realm where artistry and puzzle-solving intertwine with the House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation DLC.

name: Santa World
description: Join the festive adventure and help Santa Claus in his quest to save Christmas in this captivating platformer game, Santa World!

name: The Most Beautiful Room in the World
description: Virtual world that reenacts through interactive animations the content painted by Andrea Mantegna in the Saint Giorgio Castle in Mantua, Italy. Virtual Reality interactive animated environment. For artists and scholars.

name: Wizardry: High School Exam
description: Pass your magic exam with flying colors by surviving a final test within our dungeons. No worries, even though there may be numerous, highly resilient, and quite deadly exam golems, there is still time for you to excel, enhance your abilities, and learn a few new spells along the way.

name: Zombies Rising Dawn
description: Embark on an epic journey where you'll boldly defeat legions of relentless zombies, from the dawn of time to the end of days

name: Zipp's Café
description: Love, betrayal, and coffee! Zipp's Café is a "noir & chill" little game about a café between the city of animals and the district of insects. Make unusual recipes, get involved in shady dealings, and try to start a new life while searching for love and revenge.

name: Night Pact: Azuru
description: A broken deal will lead you into the depths of a strange cult-like group of moonshiners. Fight through with your loyal revolver, gather knowledge and solve puzzles as you keep advancing into the unknown.

name: Escape the Glubinka
description: December 6, 1994. the village of Glubnkovo. You were driving home after a very difficult day along an abandoned village and did not notice a tree peeking out ahead. In an instant, complete darkness overtook you and you passed out...

name: Teardown: Deluxe Edition
description:
Prepare the perfect heist in this simulated and fully destructible voxel world. Tear down walls with vehicles or explosives to create shortcuts. Stack objects to reach new heights. Use the environment to your advantage in the most creative way you can think of.

Teardown: Deluxe Edition includes
Teardown
Time Campers DLC - A campaign expansion set in the wild west. Available at launch.
Folkrace DLC - A campaign expansion that introduces new vehicles and a series of destructive racing game modes.

name: Editarrr
description: Challenge yourself and your friends in this pixel-perfect pirate platformer! Create your own levels and compete for swashbuckling supremacy on the global leaderboards.

name: Tribes & Monsters
description: Tribes and Monsters is a survivor-like game where you can choose a tribe and become the leader of your own army. Try to collect materials in worlds inhabited by vicious monsters. Craft, upgrade, and enhance your tribe's base to unlock more features, stronger weapons, pets and so much more!

name: Treasure Hunt Girl
description: This is a game to find hidden objects, in this cartoon world, there are many hidden props in the world, you need to find a handful of them.

name: Ultimate Solitaire Collection
description: Over 300 game variants await, from classics favorites like Klondike to exclusive original solitaire creations. Customize your solitaire adventure with card sets, backgrounds, and more. Journey through diverse locations, unlocking treasures along the way. Join now and conquer the world of solitaire!

name: Metal Casket
description: Single player simple horror game, inspired by "Iron Lung"

name: Lily in Puzzle World
description: Explore a sketchbook world in a casual mix of platforming and brainteasing puzzles!

name: Volatile Particle
description: Play as a particle with the power to manipulate your electronic charge. Leverage the laws of physics to complete levels, collect gems and set records.

name: Keo and the Cosmic Crystals
description: Keo and the Cosmic Crystals is a 2D platform game with colorful and cute graphics, featuring high difficulty and precision challenges.

name: The Boy and the Cathedral
description: Drawn to a mysterious cathedral, a boy sets out to unlock its secret.

name: Donny Donut: Dokrats
description:
Donny, Donno and Donna were invited to the ceremony of collaboration with Candy-Land and an other continent, Food-City. Everything was going perfect until a strange wizard, named Brook, enters the President's Palace. He wants to conquer the world and shape it at his mind, with the power of the Dokrats Relics. These are ancient relics from an old civilization, the Dokrats. They are the ancestors of our heroes.
The relics contents an unlimited power that only a pure soul can handle at perfection. Your quest is to get all of the Dokrats Relics and stop Brook. Will you save the world before the revival of the Demon Golem ?

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command - Raising Hell
description: A series of 7 new missions tell the story of the struggle on planet Gehenna - an unforgiving hellscape engulfed in molten lava, volcanic eruptions, and hordes of Arachnids.

name: Project: Sword Art
description: Project: Sword Art is a visually stunning, engaging and addictive match-3 game that combines spectacular anime-style artwork, addictive gameplay and an exciting fantasy world. Embark on this magical adventure, defeat seductive girls and amass the largest collection in your gallery.

name: Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow
description: Find 100 cats hiding in the cozy autumnal town of Maple Hollow in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Workplace Fantasy
description: The main stage of "Workplace Fantasy" is a fictional seaside town, which tells the story of a newly graduated intern working and living here, as well as communicating, interacting, and delving deeper into various residents of the town.

name: Hell Throne
description: A fast-paced action roguelite game with bullet hell elements, encounter based combat and high replayability. Make your way through monster infested realms as you pick and choose from a multitude of upgrades and abilities to create the meanest build possible!

name: Dungeon Heroes
description: An action-packed local co-op multiplayer dungeon crawler with a 3D cel-shaded art style.

name: Stress, Out!
description: Stress, Out! is a Top Down Gore Shooter where you can use special abilities to destroy enemies to let some stress out.

name: Death Elevator
description: Death Elevator is a simple roguelike where every hit is lethal but time slows down whenever you are in danger. Reach the top floor or die trying!

name: Cradles
description: Cradles is the first time-lapsing metaverse game – a living, breathing virtual world that continues to evolve and progress, simulating the laws of time and physics just like in real life.

name: Just Date
description: Just Date is a simulator of a real date, and it's up to you to determine how successful it will be. Share stories and jokes, treat yourself to delicious dishes, and try to win the heart of the beautiful girl, Elizabeth.

name: Naheulbeuk's Dungeon Master
description: Build, Manage & defend your dungeon in this satirical heroic fantasy universe of Dungeon of Naheulbeuk. From a shaky establishement to an infamous lair

name: Lake: Season's Greetings
description: It's Christmas time, 1985. Thomas Weiss spends the final few days of the year as he's always been doing: delivering mail and celebrating Christmas with his friends and family in Providence Oaks. However, this holiday season turns out a quite a bit different than expected...

name: The Mystery Of The Moon
description: The game of survival and construction on the surface of the moon. Learn to build a base on the surface of the moon, maintain survival, explore and discover the secrets inside the moon, and solve abnormal problems.

name: Checkmate Showdown
description: Chess meets Fighting games. Crush your opponents in the arena and on the chessboard in this online multiplayer competitive tactical fighting game that mixes the strategical elegance of Chess with the fast-paced execution of fighting games.

name: Hell Grinder
description: An intense 2D action rogue-lite game. Fight your way level by level through masses of demons and defeat bosses to delve deeper into hell. Collect demon souls to unlock permanent skills and weapons and become even more powerful.

name: Tobor
description: Tobor is a spy simulator game where your mission is to observe an insane world using a surveillance camera. You have 7 days to gather intelligence and investigate the tragic story of Undercroft.

name: Slappy Board
description: Blow off steam in Slappy Board! Immerse yourself in different themes with multiple scenarios. Keep calm or lose control, the choice is yours. But don't forget to have fun and SLAP!

name: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion
description: "Hero's Adventure" is an open world RPG game: a pixel version of the Jianghu survival simulator. It restores the experience of a common person standing out from the bottom of the heap.

name: Soul King
description: Reach out and connect. Fight through tight retro FPS levels to free dreamers from captivity. Build your army of free people until you're powerful enough to take on the Soul King itself.

name: Hades' Star: Dark Nebula
description: Join millions of players in a unique massively multiplayer strategy experience.

name: American Arcadia
description:
Escape from a televised utopia in Out of the Blue’s brand new puzzle-platformer game.

Welcome to Arcadia! A 70's retro-futuristic metropolis where all its citizens enjoy a life of luxury and comfort… unaware that they’re being broadcast live 24/7! Arcadia is not an ordinary city, but the most watched reality show on the planet - where a drop in popularity ratings comes at the highest cost: death.

Uncover the truth and escape with your life in American Arcadia!

name: Phantom Galaxies
description:
Phantom Galaxies is an open-world online space sim in which initially players take on a pivotal role in the war for control of the sectors of Canis Major.

Players will fight on the front lines as well as explore deep space to find valuable resources and uncover the powerful weapons of the Sha'Kari.

name: Trash Panda
description: A small, chill, low-fi raccoon simulator, where you play as a raccoon roaming neighbourhoods of Toronto making a mess. Knock over trash bins, find power-ups, challenge other raccoons, and get lost.

name: The Unlikely Prometheus
description: A classic 2D Point and Click adventure game

name: Flashback 2
description:
The acclaimed sci-fi side-scroller that became a retro gaming classic returns, with modern graphics and gameplay!
After overcoming the Death Tower, Conrad and his allies must once again face the Morphs, the alien race that threatens all civilizations. Moreover, his friend Ian got abducted and to get answers Conrad has to find him… Are the Morphs behind this disappearance? But why? You will have to find out…
Unveil a nefarious plot and save the solar system!

name: The Last Faith
description: The Last Faith is an exploration-based Metroidvania, action side-scrolling platformer with dark and gothic horror themes at its core. An ancient religion is ruling for centuries the world left to its fate. The once majestic capital and full of a glorious past, is now decadent and haunted by a fatal disease. Eric will have to subvert the words of the hidden prophecy and discover the truth behind the now corrupted and ravaged world.

name: Tourist Trap
description: Face an evil corporation with the help of a talking monkey in Tourist Trap, a surrealist dark comedy point and click adventure set in a South American coastal city.

name: Poké Floats: Melee
description: Stage mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Dreamcore95 Idle
description: Dreamcore inspired incremental game with vaporwave aesthetics

name: Brave New World 2
description:
BNW2 contains a total of 100 rooms across 26 exits, with 13 exits for Any% (no secrets/palaces). Most levels are 5-7 rooms in length.

Just like its predecessor, BNW2 is a showcase of glitches that exist within Super Mario World engine.
Some of these glitches (commonly found in "Kuso" hacks) can be extremely precise and require frame-perfect inputs.
My intent was to make the execution of glitches as simple as possible while still being challenging and fun.
Though the custom ASM & graphics prevent BNW2 from being a completely "vanilla" hack, the glitch tech involved *is* vanilla and can be reproduced in the base game.

name: Hawk and Puma
description:
Hawk and Puma is a minimalist game that pays tribute to Guaman Poma, the indigenous chronicler of the Andes. Through a research-creation process, this game reimagines Guaman's journey, exploring themes of racism, sovereignty, and religion from decolonial aesthetics and Andean-inspired music.

This project has been developed in collaboration with members of the ÑawpaÑan community in the Sacred Valley of the Incas in Cusco, Peru, allowing us to create the final version in English, Spanish, and Quechua, and plan upcoming ludic workshops with community youth as part of the ethical research-creation process.

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Onyx Hippogriff Mount
description:
This includes: the Onyx Hippogriff Mount.

Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Embark on a journey through familiar and new locations as you explore and discover magical beasts, customize your character and craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents and become the wizard you want to be.

Experience Hogwarts in the 1800s. Your character is a student who holds the key to an ancient secret that threatens to tear the wizarding world apart. Make allies, battle Dark wizards, and ultimately decide the fate of the wizarding world. Your legacy is what you make of it. Live the Unwritten.

name: Cook, Serve, Delicious! 1/2 Bundle!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Gears Forever
description: The original Steampunk Ball Roller is back! The spiritual successor to the original ball rolling hit is here! Explore the enchanting realm of Gears Forever, an exquisite 3D ball-rolling platformer brimming with imaginative challenges. Accumulate points with a simple swipe of your finger. Race against the clock while gathering gears across an endless realm spread across three distinct worlds!

name: Ariko's Enchanted Forest
description: It's a fun 2D jumping game for kids as well as for adults. The game takes place in an enchanted forest full of witches. Your mission is to collect as many coins as possible and get out of there.

name: Hentai Anime Girls Succubus
description: Puzzle Your Way to Passion - Discover Anime Temptations!

name: CopyPasta with Cheese
description: Sin descripción

name: Insomnis Experiment
description:
Inspired by 'The Russian Sleep Experiment' creepypasta.

'Russian researchers in the late 1940s kept five people awake for fifteen days using an experimental gas based stimulant.'

Explore the facility, find out what happened and what remains there.

Keep cutting.

The game is 10 minutes long.

name: Cozy Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Sim World 4: Blackpool Branches: Preston - Blackpool & Ormskirk Route Add-On
description: The 1980s beckon and bumpy rides abound! Experience the infamous Pacer across multiple lines in the North of England. Just Trains make their show-stopping debut into Train Sim World with Blackpool Branches: Preston - Blackpool & Ormskirk!

name: Incoherence
description: The game follows Kate, a resilient protagonist grappling with the loss of her beloved sister.

name: Wildagotchi: Virtual Pet - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: United Football
description:
United Football is a free to play, multiplayer, 5-a-side online football game.

United Football allows players to play in teams consisting of both human and AI players and boasts a unique control system and viewpoint that puts the gamer right in the action.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of the Blood Moon
description: Invasions Season of the Blood Moon is underway! Be sure to take down the invading Nitara and add her blood-filled rewards to your kollection before the season ends on December 11.

name: Satisfactory: Update 8
description: New Power Tower & Priority Power Switch buildings, new advanced game settings, improvements to blueprints, biomes and more.

name: The Mountain is as It Always Was
description: A small narrative game about mountains, emptiness, loss, and remembering what it means to be alive.

name: Immortal Love: Polar Lights Collector's Edition
description: You're off to the Midgard Fair! It's the perfect opportunity for you to make some money selling goods for your upcoming wedding. But your plans are quickly derailed when Loki, God of mischief, accidentally turns your fiancé into a wolf!

name: The King Of Fighters XV: Character - Hinako Shijo
description: [Product Contents]"Hinako Shijo" can be used in The King Of Fighters XV.

name: Thank you for sharing your world
description: This work aimed to reproduce the world experienced by blind people, focusing on the expressive uniqueness of VR.

description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”Active module “Ties of Shadows”Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperator”Unique modifier “Baphomet pulse discharge”Unique portrait “Sectator”Pattern “Threads of power”Decor “Greedy one”Permanent credit reward bonus +10%Additionally, the pilot r

name: Star Conflict: Baphomet
description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 17 tackler “Baphomet”Special weapon “Missile module Trinity”Active module “Ties of Shadows”Unique portrait “Sectator”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

name: The Imperial Capital Burns: Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse
description: A prequel to Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse which follows Takamura Yui and her friends during their time as surface pilot cadets.

name: Ticket to Ride: Europe Expansion
description: Hello! Bonjour! Ciao! Hola! Hérete! Buna ziua! The Ticket to Ride European Expansion will take you from coast-to-coast on land and sea as you build your travel network! Tunnel through the Alps, claim ferry routes across the Mediterranean, and complete tickets from Portugal to Poland!

name: Ticket to Ride: Round the World Ticket
description: All aboard for the ultimate Ticket to Ride adventure! Build railway networks around the globe, through North America, Europe, and beyond! With the Around the World Ticket, you'll get the European Expansion and 9 more Expansions as they're released!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 3." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 2." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: CosmicBreak Universal: Ray - Fan Pack
description: CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Ray's fans! A must-have for all Ray enthusiasts, this DLC includes the Ray and Ray-chan robots, as well as DLC limited themed accessories, titles, and other useful items like Gacha Tickets and Boost Items!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Pumpkin Delight Set - Autumn 2023
description: Get pumpkin spice and everything nice!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Rustic Retreat Set - Autumn 2022
description: Watch your garden transform into autumn!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Countryside Charm Set - Autumn 2022
description: Decorate as a local mom n' pop pizzeria!
